detailed_info.name: Ginseng root extract
detailed_info.description: Panax ginseng, the ginseng, also known as Asian ginseng, Chinese ginseng, or Korean ginseng, is a species of plant whose root is the original source of ginseng. It is a perennial plant that grows in the mountains of Eastern Asia.

functions.name: Hair conditioning
functions.description: Leaves hair easy to comb, soft, soft and shiny and / or confers volume, lightness and shine

functions.name: Skin protecting
functions.description: Helps to avoid the harmful effects of external factors on the skin

functions.name: Tonic
functions.description: Produces a feeling of well-being on skin and hair

detailed_info.description: American ginseng (Panax quinquefolius, Panacis quinquefolis) is a herbaceous perennial plant in the ivy family, commonly used as Chinese or traditional medicine. It is native to eastern North America, though it is also cultivated in China. Since the 18th century, American ginseng (P. quinquefolius) has been primarily exported to Asia, where it is highly valued for perceived superior quality and sweet taste.
